titleInfo.title: Bücher aus der Bibliothek Friedrich von Logaus in Weimar
Books from the Library of Friedrich von Logau in Weimar

mods.abstract: The article deals with the lost library of the poet Friedrich von Logau. Although an heir of a handsome collection, which he expanded vigorously, he left to his son no more than a dozen books, which are preserved in the Herzogin Anna Amalia Library at Weimar today among thousands of new purchases by the son, Balthasar Friedrich von Logau.
